body_html: It seems that the only problem is that the exceptions aren't caught by the try blocks. I get that it's annoying, but it shouldn't block you because most of the exceptions are fatal anyway.
body_text: It seems that the only problem is that the exceptions aren't caught by the try blocks. I get that it's annoying, but it shouldn't block you because most of the exceptions are fatal anyway.
body: It seems that the only problem is that the exceptions aren't caught by the try blocks. I get that it's annoying, but it shouldn't block you because most of the exceptions are fatal anyway.
